memberdef.initializer:
{\ SchemaValidator validator(schema);\ Document d;\ /*printf("
%s
", json);*/\ d.Parse(json);\ EXPECT_FALSE(d.HasParseError());\ EXPECT_TRUE(expected == d.Accept(validator));\ EXPECT_TRUE(expected == validator.IsValid());\ ValidateErrorCode code = validator.GetInvalidSchemaCode();\ if (expected) {\ EXPECT_TRUE(code == kValidateErrorNone);\ EXPECT_TRUE(validator.GetInvalidSchemaKeyword() == 0);\ }\ if ((expected) && !validator.IsValid()) {\ StringBuffer sb;\ validator.GetInvalidSchemaPointer().StringifyUriFragment(sb);\ printf("Invalid schema: %s
", sb.GetString());\ printf("Invalid keyword: %s
", validator.GetInvalidSchemaKeyword());\ printf("Invalid code: %d
", code);\ printf("Invalid message: %s
", GetValidateError_En(code));\ sb.Clear();\ validator.GetInvalidDocumentPointer().StringifyUriFragment(sb);\ printf("Invalid document: %s
", sb.GetString());\ sb.Clear();\ Writer<StringBuffer> w(sb);\ validator.GetError().Accept(w);\ printf("Validation error: %s
", sb.GetString());\ }\ }
